page.title: 05A Day In The Life Of Joanna
page.content: In the morning me and dad get up at 7.00.I get ready,pack my bags for school and put the rabbit out in her grass run.My rabbit is called Rupy. She is black and white. Dad makes breakfast,I don't have any. He has toast and marmalade. My mum and brother Tom rise at 8.00. Me and Tom leave for school at 8.30. We arrive at 8.45.We play ball or skipping in the yard until 9.00,when school starts. We have playtime at 10.30 and at 2.30.Me and Tom take a packed lunch.We eat at 12.30. My mum works.She plays the piano at five schools.In the evening she gives piano lesons at home.My dad is a teacher.He works in Barnsley.He comes home at 5.00. Me and Tom go to bed at 8.30 and read till 8.45.
